actions.committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to require that the unsafe conditions of the firing range at the Lorton Reformatory in Lorton, Virginia, presently constituting a severe threat to public safety in the adjoining community be corrected before any part of the Federal payment to the District of Columbia for fiscal year 1984 may be obligated or expended.

summary.text: Prohibits any part of any amount appropriated to the District of Columbia as the Federal payment to the District for FY 1984 from being obligated or expended until the conditions at the firing range at the Lorton Reformatory in Lorton, Virginia, that presently pose a severe public safety hazard to the community adjoining the reformatory have been corrected.

titles.title: A bill to require that the unsafe conditions of the firing range at the Lorton Reformatory in Lorton, Virginia, presently constituting a severe threat to public safety in the adjoining community be corrected before any part of the Federal payment to the District of Columbia for fiscal year 1984 may be obligated or expended.
